name: Pick & Tick
description:
Wake up your sleeping brain by this unique mix of mini PUZZLE GAMES & TRIVIA QUIZ with amazing fun facts about the world around us!

Challenging and endless fun!

- 600+ fun trivia quizzes
- 12 different puzzle games
- Relaxing music
- Compete with other players or try to beat your own high score
- Share the fun with your family and friends
- Collect the trophies for more free games

Have fun and keep your mind sharp!
